Dining and Living Rooms

Live. Lounge. Laugh.

Crossing the Rock has been carefully designed for you to use each space as you please. The interior furnishings lend themselves to casual holiday lounging or embracing formality. You set the tone! The living areas are made up of two interconnecting lounge spaces and one formal dining room with its own terrace.

Classically Italian with a light dreamy colour pallet.
loading
loading
loading
loading

  • 2X Interconnecting living rooms

    4 sofas and 3 armchairs

  • 1X Formal dining room

    Seats up to 14 at the dining table

  • Size

    120sqm

loading
loading
loading
loading

The table is laid for dinner, did someone say dress to impress? Let the serata begin!
loading

Floor plan

Features and Amenities

  • Daily maid service
  • Cook on request
  • Daily continental breakfast*
  • Pool (LxW in m) 10x5
  • Air conditioning and heating
  • Safe for storing valuables
  • Lift
  • Washing machine
  • Dishwasher
  • Microwave oven
  • Landline phone
  • Laptop computer
  • Printer
  • SKY TV
  • DVD player
  • Stereo
  • WI-FI internet
  • Barbecue
  • Table tennis
  • Technogym treadmill
  • Sea views
  • Easy walk to beach/sea access**
  • Walking distance to restaurants***
  • Walking distance to shop***

*One member of staff is responsible for the preparation of breakfast. This service includes grocery shopping for breakfast items, preparing the table for breakfast and cleaning up afterwards. Please note that food costs are extra and should be paid locally in cash upon presentation of receipts.

**From the bathing platforms along the seafront of Santa Maria La Scala.

***There are a couple of restaurants, a caf and a small shop in Santa Maria La Scala.
